mapper.select: SELECT Car_Model_Lv1.* , Car_Brand.ename as brandEname, Car_Brand.cname as brandCname FROM Car_Model_Lv1 LEFT JOIN Car_Brand ON Car_Model_Lv1.id = #{id} and Car_Model_Lv1.carBrand = Car_Brand.id WHERE Car_Model_Lv1.flagUseable = 'yes' and Car_Model_Lv1.id = #{id} ORDER BY orderIndex
SELECT * FROM Car_Model_Lv2 WHERE flagUseable = 'yes' and carModelLv1 = #{carModelLv1Id} ORDER BY orderIndex
SELECT * FROM Car_Model_Lv3 WHERE flagUseable = 'yes' and carModelLv2 = #{carModelLv2Id} ORDER BY orderIndex
